title.rendered: Samsung Original Combo Charge and Sync USB-C/Micro USB Cable – White

content.rendered:
Product Description

Charge and sync your Micro USB suitable gadgets or USB-C suitable Samsung Galaxy S9 shortly and conveniently with this official combo cable from Samsung.

Compatible with all USB-C gadgets

The cable is suitable with all gadgets with a USB-C connector, such because the HTC 10, Google Pixel and 2017 Galaxy A variety to call however just a few. With extra and extra gadgets now that includes a USB-C connection, this cable is ready to present your telephone with blistering switch and charging speeds.

Switch tip design for twin compatibility

Don’t fear in case your system contains a Micro USB port, although – this cable’s swap tip design ensures full compatibility with each Micro USB and USB-C, protecting the overwhelming majority of gadgets presently available on the market. This additionally means you may by no means be and not using a cost and sync cable, regardless of the place you go – and if mates and household have to borrow your cable, you may nearly all the time have the best connector.

Ultra-fast knowledge switch

Suitable for syncing knowledge between your telephone and laptop, this cable helps USB 3.1, offering excessive switch speeds that assist you to shortly copy photos, films and way more.

Supports quick charging

While many older Micro USB and USB-C cables would help charging speeds of round 0.5 Amps, this Official Samsung Combo Cable can deal with charging speeds of as much as 3 Amps for vastly superior charging.

Official Samsung product

With this being a real Samsung cable, you may be assured of the best high quality and extremely-reliability, in addition to compatibility together with your telephone and all associated equipment.

Box Contains

Samsung Original Combo Charge & Sync USB-C and Micro USB Cable – White

Make certain this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
